channel.title: MGS4 - Easter eggs *May include minor spoilers*
channel.description:
Well as i completed the game the first time around you don't notice much but the second time around you specifically look for little things.
Some of you may already know, but in the cutscenes you can use the Mk. ll (Metal Gear) to go around the plane where the mission cutscenes are, you can go pretty much anywhere in the plane while the cutscene is still going on, you can have it split screen (quarter of its the mk. ll, half the actual cutscene) but you can change this to full screen, one thing i did not try the first time around is going up these stairs to sunnys kitchen to see her cooking her eggs (lulz) and i noticed her get a psp out of the box and start playing on it.
Sorry for the bad quality: [img]http://eugn.co.uk/PostImages/sunny.JPG[/img] which i just noticed is fucking huge.
I'll add some more when i find them.

item.title: MGS4 - Easter eggs *May include minor spoilers*
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Sorry for the horrible quality, the Metal Gear Mk. ll’s camera effect doesn’t help much either.

Thats supposed to be the MGS4 special edition ps3 which looks like this:

Thats made out of a different material and is ‘gun metal grey’.

Read full topic

item.title: MGS4 - Easter eggs *May include minor spoilers*
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

There always been easter eggs on MGS’s, wasn’t there a nintendo poster or something in MGS 2 or 1, can’t remember, but there are a lot.

Easter Egg hunting is fun, but it can be Shit if you’ve been looking for ages and haven’t found anything at all.

GL hunting :D.

Read full topic

item.title: MGS4 - Easter eggs *May include minor spoilers*
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

There is plenty more, just it takes some time to get to them places, what i find amazing is that the game seems to carry on doing other stuff around you. Like when you go onto the cctv cam you see sunny doing other things, like making pot noodles and eggs and doing other random stuff

Read full topic
